scenario_text.value:
What? There’s nothing around here.
Hurry back!

(Jeez. He’s such a coward, but he still acts
like he’s the one in charge...)
(Maybe I should tease him just a little?)
Naw, leave him be.
Yeah, let’s go for it.
I thought about moving around for a bit.

Okay...
Then I should look around, too...

It’ll be dangerous.
Stay close, okay?
Yeah, I know!
Ryo’s hard to handle, huh...
Kewee!

Everyone else went off that way.
It’ll just be you here.
Why did they go and leave me alone?!
You’re not scared, are you?

NO! I just don’t know what’ll happen.
I’m just warning you!
You’re frightened, aren’t you?
Kewee!
Enough already. I’ll follow you.

(It’ll be better if he comes and helps,
instead of just staying here terrified.)

Oh, right.
Here, take this.
Huh? But what is it?

This bug found it. He finds some useful
stuff, but also some junk.
Kew, kew...
Oh? Thanks, Kunemon. And you too, Ryo.
Hmph...
Anyway, we’d better get moving.

Okay, I get it.
You go ahead and I’ll follow.

Uh...are you sure? You could stay here and
keep looking around on your own if you want.

Are you nuts? Acting alone is just asking for
it! How stupid can you get?

(Yeah, I figured he’d say something like
that. Oh well.)

Now, don’t you go wandering off on your own.
Don’t even think about it!
